typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,

		installment as double,

		sub_grade as string,

		desc as string,

		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,

		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,

		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,

		open_rv_24m as string,

		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(skid as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,

		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string,
		skid as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'delete from dbo.dimproductstable where productid = 737',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(term=='36 months')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	TargetPK1Parameter as string[] (['id'])
}

	partitionColumn: 'id',
	partitionBy('external', 64)) ~> source1

		id as integer,

		loan_amnt as short,
		funded_amnt as short,

source1 aggregate(groupBy(mycols = sha2(256,columns())),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
source2, DistinctRows join(source2@id == DistinctRows@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

scriptLines: source1, source2 assert(expectTrue(CountryRegion == 'United States', false, 'nonUS', null, 'only valid for U.S. addresses'),
expectExists(source1@AddressID == source2@AddressID, false, 'assertExist', StateProvince == 'Washington', toString(source1@AddressID) + ' already exists in Washington'),
expectUnique(source1@AddressID, false, 'uniqueness', null, toString(source1@AddressID) + ' is not unqiue')) ~> Assert1

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressType as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustAddress
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customer
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Address
Customer, CustAddress join(Customer@CustomerID == CustAddress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Address join(CustAddress@AddressID == Address@AddressID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(StateProvince),
	numberofms = countIf(Title == 'Ms.',1),
		numberofmr = countIf(Title == 'Mr.',1)) ~> Aggregate1
Join2 derive(customerStruct = @(lastname=LastName,
		phone=Phone,
		state=CountryRegion)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		customerStruct
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CustAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

parameters{
	dqrule1 as string ("Color == 'Red'")
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 filter(toBoolean(expr($dqrule1))) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['param.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string,
		skid as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'id',
	partitionBy('external', 32)) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as double,
		total_bal_il as double,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as double,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as double,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(member_id = toInteger(null()),
		emp_title = sha2(256,emp_title,'mysalt'),
		column1 = 1,
		local1 := 'abc',
		local2 := '123') ~> MaskingPII
Assert1 split(!hasError('assertTerm'),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Terms@(term36, otherTerm)
MaskingPII, Aggregate1 lookup(column1 == aggkey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Assert2 aggregate(funded_amnt_stddev = round(stddev(funded_amnt),2),
		funded_amnt_avg = round(avg(funded_amnt),2),
		rowcounts = count(1),
		aggkey = max(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Lookup1 assert(expectTrue(instr(term,'36') != 0, false, 'assertTerm', null, 'Term must be 36 months')) ~> Assert1
source2 assert(expectTrue(!isNull(grade) && in(['A','B','C','D'],grade), false, 'assertGrade', null, grade + ' is not valid'),
	expectUnique(id, false, 'assertUniqueID', null, toString(id) + ' is not unqiue'),
	expectTrue(length(toString(id)) == 6, false, 'assertIDvalue')) ~> Assert2
Terms@term36 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['term36.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Terms@otherTerm sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['terms.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> lookupSink

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'ProductID',
	partitionBy('external', 4)) ~> SQLProds
SQLProds select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PruneCols
PruneCols derive(product = @(name=Name,
		color=Color),
		margin = ['cost'->StandardCost,'price'->ListPrice],
		deconstructedName = split(Name,' ')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['moviemap1.parquet'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NewCustomers
NewCustomers alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 derive(FirstName = 'mark') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID','ModifiedDate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	filename as string ('SampleData/moviesDB.csv'),
	columns as string ('movie,title'),
	dbname as string ('products')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($filename)]) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DBSource
LabelSource2 split(isNull(byName('ProductID')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(badSchema, goodSchema)
LabelSource split(isNull(columnNames()[8]),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(badColCount, goodColCount)
ConditionalSplit2@goodColCount derive(MovieID = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		MovieTitle = byName('title'),
		MovieYearReleased = toInteger(byName('year')),
		MovieRating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		MovieGenres = split(toString(byName('genres')),'|')) ~> BuildModel
ConditionalSplit2@badColCount, ConditionalSplit1@badSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupBadSources
BuildModel, ConditionalSplit1@goodSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupGoodSources
source1 derive(sourcename = $filename,
		ruleName = 'Column Count') ~> LabelSource
DBSource derive(sourcename = $dbname,
		ruleName = 'ID Check') ~> LabelSource2
GroupBadSources derive(results = 'bad') ~> SetAsBad
GroupGoodSources derive(results = 'good') ~> SetAsGood
SetAsBad, SetAsGood union(byName: true)~> GroupAll
GroupAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['metachecker.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		sourcename,
		ruleName,
		results
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteResults

parameters{
	filename as string ('SampleData/moviesDB.csv'),
	columns as string ('movie,title'),
	dbname as string ('products')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($filename)]) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DBSource
LabelSource2 split(isNull(byName('ProductID')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(badSchema, goodSchema)
LabelSource split(isNull(columnNames()[8]),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(badColCount, goodColCount)
ConditionalSplit2@goodColCount derive(MovieID = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		MovieTitle = byName('title'),
		MovieYearReleased = toInteger(byName('year')),
		MovieRating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		MovieGenres = split(toString(byName('genres')),'|')) ~> BuildModel
ConditionalSplit2@badColCount, ConditionalSplit1@badSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupBadSources
BuildModel, ConditionalSplit1@goodSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupGoodSources
source1 derive(sourcename = $filename,
		ruleName = 'Column Count') ~> LabelSource
DBSource derive(sourcename = $dbname,
		ruleName = 'ID Check') ~> LabelSource2
GroupBadSources derive(results = 'bad') ~> SetAsBad
GroupGoodSources derive(results = 'good') ~> SetAsGood
SetAsBad, SetAsGood union(byName: true)~> GroupAll
GroupAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['metachecker.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		sourcename,
		ruleName,
		results
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteResults

source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		json_value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source8
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source9
Filter1 parse(levelandregistration = json_value ? (level as string,
		registration as long),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ParseJSON
source8 filter(ProductDescriptionID == 3) ~> Filter1
ParseJSON parse(newdesc = Description ? (desc1 as string,
		desc2 as string,
		desc3 as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> ParseCSV
ParseCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

Filter1 derive(loan_amnt = toDecimal(loan_amnt,2),
		column1 = upper(home_ownership)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

properties.description: Example of a slowly changing dimension type 2 where we will create a new row for a changed product dimension, using both an active flag and an effective date field.

dataflowSinks.name: SinkAWCustomers
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkAWCustomers
